message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think you'll find it incredibly valuable.  I'm asking for $14,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can't justify spending $14,000 on it at this time. Would you consider lowering the price to $12,000?
Hi Bob, thanks for your reply. I understand your position, but $12,000 is a bit too low for me. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $13,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While $13,000 is closer to my budget, I still feel that $12,000 would be a fair compromise. Would you be able to meet me at $12,000?
